string-array.name: create_statements
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE exercise (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name VARCHAR (50) UNIQUE)
CREATE TABLE category (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name VARCHAR (50) UNIQUE)

CREATE TABLE category_exercise (categoryId INTEGER REFERENCES category (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, exerciseId INTEGER REFERENCES exercise (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (categoryId, exerciseId))
CREATE TABLE workout (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name VARCHAR (50))

CREATE TABLE workout_exercise (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, workoutId INTEGER REFERENCES workout (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, exerciseId INTEGER REFERENCES exercise (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, sets INTEGER, reps INTEGER)
